name: Rhythm Race
description:
A brief note from the developers:

The game will still undergo many changes in mechanics and visuals, we count on your feedback to make the game more and more profitable.


Rhythm Race is a rhythm game with different songs in a setting mixed with futurism, neon and synth wave. In it, you will compete against legends of the futuristic race and do your best to win.

Current Content

  • 11 songs in quick play mode with 3 difficulty levels.
  • Playable tutorial mode to learn how to play quickly.

Future Content

  • The quick game contains all songs from the career mode (+20) and extra songs.
  • A career mode that tells the story of our character in a dark and dark world.
  • A workshop for customizing your car in all game modes.
  • Endless mode for you to relax during the game.
  • Steam achievements.
  • Ultimate Difficult.
  • Leaderboard
